name: df-wl-rab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0
body: |- wceq(wl-crab(s0, c0, w0), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0)))))
comment: Define a restricted class abstraction (class builder), which is the class of all ` x ` in ` A ` such that ` ph ` is true. Definition of [TakeutiZaring] p. 20. (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) Isolate x from A. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 28-May-2023.)
